Test.name: Logical Op
Test.WhatTest: Tests a content including the AND, OR and NOT operators.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Modal Op
Test.WhatTest: Tests a content including the B, U and I operators.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Quantifiers
Test.WhatTest: Tests a content including the EXISTS and FORALL operators.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Action Expressions
Test.WhatTest: Tests a content including the | (ACTION_ALTERNATIVE) and ; (ACTION_SEQUENCE) operators.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if no exception is fired.
